metadata.name: Early Majority Member #1
metadata.description:
Muse No. I: Calliope - the muse of poetry.

Early Majority is an outdoor community that makes gear for its members and empowers them to enjoy it. We have an epic vision: to disrupt the environmentally toxic apparel industry by tapping into our global community of adventurers. We produce fewer, high-quality products uniquely for our members, and we grow by expanding supportive community rather than proliferating products.

This special 1 of 1 Member Badge NFT grants the holder lifetime access to membership perks on the Early Majority website (www.earlymajority.com), as well as a direct line to the Early Majority team to get one of everything we make, forever.
